item.title: SSG4
item.description: Static Sites for an Indieweb - Open-source, public domain, educational initiative for applying indieweb principles to static site web-publishing. This site is very much a work in progress, I’m happy for as far as its come. It now supports header images, and twitter cards. I am fairly pleased with the overall operation of Indigo.

item.title: Introducing Indigo
item.description: Indigo is a lightweight theme for Hugo with IndieWeb features baked in. It’s great for longer-form blogging, placing its focus on distraction-free reading and beautiful typefaces.
